dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed] :DMCA NOTIFICATION
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: steve@awbs.com [mailto:steve@awbs.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 09, 2006 5:18 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed] :DMCA
NOTIFICATION

ATTN: George Poletes, Corporate Counsel 1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110,
Dallas, TX 75207
SUBJECT: Notification of Copyright Infringement under Title 17, Section 512,
of The United States Code

Per the DMCA you are requested to remove the following copyright protected
software, and links to the same, from the sites under your control.

I hereby attest that I am the author of "DRAMS" (http://dramsystem.com), a
software of which I hold full copyright rights.
I have not authorized you, nor any sites hosted on your servers, sites
controlled by hosted sites on your server to distribute my software,
especially "cracked" software which defeats my software protection.

Location of DMCA violation:
http://www.tecniconline.com.ar/post-8333.html&sid=4a850b754afcd8422fd7a73693
a8b05d
Listing:
DRAMS 4.0 Standard Nulled TNO
http://scripts.wmtrader.com/dramsV40-nullified_TNO.zip


Please remove the offending software, links to software, and dns entries
pointing to the software immediately.

Regards,
Stephen Ahnen
http://www.awbs.com
Total Online Solutions Inc.
15 Paradise Plaza Suite 241
Sarasota, FL  34239
941-924-9422



----- Original Message -----
From: "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com>
To: <steve@awbs.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Monday, January 09, 2006 4:57 PM
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed]


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
> substantially comply with the required notification elements of the 
> Digital
> Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
>
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your 
> claim.
>
> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
>
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
> Sent: Monday, January 09, 2006 12:49 PM
> To: copyright@theplanet.com; steve@awbs.com
> Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed]
>
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

> address of copyright@theplanet.com.
>

> Subject: [ABUSE] Pirated software being distributed

> From: <steve@awbs.com>
> Reply-To: steve@awbs.com
> Organization: AWBS
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
>
> See this link:
>
http://www.tecniconline.com.ar/post-8333.html&sid=4a850b754afcd8422fd7a73693
> a8b05d
>
> All software is located at scripts.wmtrader.com.
>
> Pinging wmtrader.com [69.93.102.178] with 32 bytes of data:
>
> Owner of wmtrader.com is hosting on a theplanet server, with dns pointing 
> to
> the pirated software.
> Links to other illegal activities are on the www.wmtrader.com forums.
>
> Please remove this site and its dns entries.
>

>
> - --

>
